original_text: He sent Eliakim, Shebna and the leaders of the priests to Amoz's son, Isaiah the prophet. Eliakim was the most important officer in the king's palace. Shebna was a government officer. They were all wearing sackcloth.
korean_text: 왕궁 맡은 자 엘리아김과 서기관 셉나와 제사장 중 어른들도 굵은 베 옷을 입으니라 왕이 그들을 아모스의 아들 선지자 이사야에게로 보내매

sentences.original_text: He sent Eliakim, Shebna and the leaders of the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 엘리야김과 스브나와 제사장들의 지도자들을 보내니

sentences.original_text: to Amoz's son, Isaiah the prophet
Eliakim was the most important officer

sentences.korean_translation: 그들 모두는 굵은 베옷을 입고 있었다
